name: Deep Below (itch) (Zortog)
description:
GMTK 2021 GameJam game. Theme: Joined together.

In game deep below, you are a creature in deep ocean, feeding on hard shells. when you eat and grow, you grow addition tentacles. When you have 5, you need to absorb scary monsters and get additional power(join together). 

Controls:  WASD to move, SPACE to shoot hook(which attached to shells or harmful objects), LSHIFT to absorb big creatures when you reach 5 tentacles.
